name: Custom encryption 2
description: Now you have implemented a way to encipher 'abcdefghi' you need to see if you can crack our super secure password 'fbgdceah'
hint:
Applying the reverse algorithm to abdec should result in abcde

swi 4, 0 swp d, b rev 0, 4 rol 1 mov 1, 4 mov 3, 0 rot b rot d ror 2
